amendment.description: An amendment numbered 587 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to direct the VA to conduct an awareness campaign regarding the types of fertility treatments, procedures, and services that are available to veterans experiencing issues with fertility, covered under the VA medical benefits package.
amendment.purpose: Amendment directs the VA to conduct an awareness campaign regarding the types of fertility treatments, procedures, and services that are available to veterans experiencing issues with fertility, covered under the VA medical benefits package.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A045) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 187 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A045) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A045) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 243 - 187 (Roll no. 349).
